title: VA - Phat Trax Vol.5 (The Best Of Old School)@320
description:
Disco and funk combine on Phat Trax: The Best of Old School, Vol. 5, which pays tribute to the sounds that inspired hip-hop. Rolling, voluptuous basslines, uptight guitars, and vibrant brass sections drive tracks like the Gap Band&#039;s "You Dropped a Bomb on Me," the Emotions&#039; "Best of My Love," and Cheryl Lynn&#039;s "Got to Be Real," bridging the gap between funk and disco and providing countless rap and hip-hop artists with ample sampling material. Heatwave&#039;s "Groove Line," Natalie Cole&#039;s "Be Thankful," GQ&#039;s "Disco Nights (Rock Freak)," and the Dazz Band&#039;s "Joystick" are among the other highlights of this funky, stylish compilation, which documents just how integral these songs were to hip-hop&#039;s development. (AMG)



01. The Gap Band - You Dropped A Bomb On Me                                                                        
02. Heatwave - The Groove Line                                                                                     
03. Cheryl Lynn - Got To Be Real                                                                                   
04. Emotions - Best Of My Love                                                                                     
05. Natalie Cole - Be Thankful                                                                                     
06. GQ - Disco Nights (Rock Freak)                                                                                 
07. People&#039;s Choice - Do It Any Way You Wanna                                                                      
08. Laid Back - White Horse                                                                                        
09. Dazz Band - Joystick                                                                                           
10. Foxy - Get Off  


Label: Rino
Released: 1994

BITRATE: 320
